```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}

# Determine the class this is rendered for
is_R6Member <-
    knitr::opts_current$get(".doc_class_name") == "R6Member"
is_R6MemberRestriction <-
    knitr::opts_current$get(".doc_class_name") == "R6MemberRestriction"

# Set plural-s if not a single `R6MemberRestriction`
singular_plural <-
    if (!is_R6MemberRestriction) {
        "s"
    } else {
        NULL
    }

# Set the field's parent reference
ref_parent <-
    if (is_R6MemberRestriction) {
        .doc_ref_self()
    } else {
        .doc_ref(
            tag = "restrictions"
        )
    }

# Set id field reference
ref_id <- paste(
    .doc_ref(
        tag = "id",
        topic = "R6MemberRestriction",
        text = "id",
        suffix = singular_plural
    )
)
# Set restriction field reference
ref_restriction <-
    .doc_ref(
        tag = "restriction",
        topic = "R6MemberRestriction",
        text = "restriction function",
        suffix = singular_plural
    )

# Output argument documentation
.doc_arg(
    type = "integer",
    description = c(
        "The amount of information about",
        if (!is.null(singular_plural)) {
            "each of"
        },
        "the",
        ref_parent,
        "to be printed.",
        "One of:",
        .doc_tbl(
            rbind(
                # No information is printed
                c(
                    "`0`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what()
                ),
                # `id` is printed
                c(
                    "`1`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what(
                        ref_id
                    )
                ),
                # `id` and `restriction` are printed
                c(
                    "`2`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what(
                        ref_id,
                        ref_restriction
                    )
                )
            ),
            width = c(15, 2, 60),
            alignment = c("r", "c", "l")
        ),
        ""
    )
)
```
